subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The 14-year-old amateur Alexis Thompson is the youngest person to make the cut at the U.S. Women’s Open since Marlene Hagge did it in 1947 at 13.
snippet: The 14-year-old amateur Alexis Thompson is the youngest person to make the cut at the U.S. Women’s Open since Marlene Hagge did it in 1947 at 13.
